Text:
Hey whorepig how are you able to rip the videos from teennick (can you tell me)? I've tried everything and nothing works :/

Or are you just using screencap software?
hey, thanks, but do you have episode 13 or 14 ? if you have can you post, please :)

Nevermind, I figured out how to rip the videos myself, can't believe I couldn't figure it out before.

Thanks a lot whorepig for the uploads.

Hopefully I'll be contributing soon, I'll be downloading from TPB a lot less now! m/
Those are are my files, lol.  You removed my tag from the filename, are you trying to take credit for my work, whorepig?
I will be ripping & uploading the next episodes.  Go to livingonvideo-tv(.)blogspot(.)com

Yurune, you sound like the MPAA or RIAA, You don't own anything you share. Get over your ego!
Tags or groups have no place in sharing.
sorry yurune, wasn't trying to take credit so much as shorten the very long filename...was just trying to share the goodness! apologies if I offended.
Thanks for the upload! Keep em coming ;)
THANK YOU!! This made my night :D.
I'm glad everyone is enjoying my rips/uploads, so you're welcome!  Hopefully people snatching them from my blog and uploading them here will give me credit next time.

shutup assnozzle, or I'll strip your name off every file and up them to every major torrent site.

You douchebag!

YOU DON'T OWN Degrassi content!

Yurune makes money off piracy by getting a commission on filelocker downloads.

This hypocrite has back years of Degrassi files that others ripped, and HE put his site name on them.

Hypocrite assh0le!

I get literally just a few pennies from spending HOURS and hours ripping and uploading tv shows that people ask me to upload for them, so I'm hardly in this for the money.

I am not a hypocrite.  I personally ripped Degrassi seasons 5 thru 10 from my own DVDs, that's why they have my name on them.  2hd ripped season 11, so they do NOT have my name on them.

I never said I owned Degrassi content.  Most people are appreciative of what I do, but feel free not to download them if you disagree.
